name: Keyword Replacer
description:
Rename files and remove / replace a certain keyword in just a few clicks.

Steps:

Step 1: Press "Select Folder..." and select the folder containing the files you wish to rename.

Step 2: Enter the keyword in the "Keyword" field that the the program should search for.

Step 3: Enter the replacer in the "Replace with..." field. This will be what "Keyword" will get replaced by in your file name. (EG: If your file was named "This is not a file.txt", and your keyword was "not", and your replacer was "actually", it would replace all instances of the word "not" with the word "actually", making this file "This is actually a file.txt". 

Step 4: Click "Run". All files will be renamed.
